content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Heydar Aliyev

and Russian President Vladimir Putin in Sochi in 2001.]]
This article consists of the list of international official and work trips made by Heydar Aliyev, the third President of Azerbaijan, during the terms of his presidency.
